net.mwav.framework

Class ValidationLib

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.mwav.framework.ValidationLib

  • public class ValidationLib
extends java.lang.Object
    This class provides various validation methods for 'String' type data. It internally uses regular expression, so the target data must be 'String' type.

    In order to create ValidationLib object, the application calls getInstance() method.

    If there is no method needed, you can use matches(CharSequence, String) and contains(CharSequence, CharSequence).

    Since:
    1.0.1
    Version:
    v1.0
    Author:
    (정) 남동희
    See Also:
    Pattern

      • isLength

        public boolean isLength(java.lang.CharSequence input,
                        int criteria,
                        boolean mode)
        Compares the length of the input String according to mode

        When mode is true, returns true if the length(string) is equals or greater than the length of criteria

        Otherwise, returns true if the length(string) is equals or less than the length of criteria

        Parameters:
        input - the input
        criteria - the criteria
        mode - comparison mode
        Returns:
        boolean

        public boolean isKor(java.lang.CharSequence input)
